content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's my pleasure to show you the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you considering to rent it?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good question, Herr Schmidt. Considering the size and location of the apartment, I would say around 700 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 700 euros per month is an interesting offer. However, I must say that I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to negotiate a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Herr Schmidt. How about 750 euros per month? It's a good midpoint between your price and mine.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 750 euros per month is a step in the right direction, but I believe the apartment is worth more. Would you be willing to go up to 800 euros per month? This would be a fair reflection of the market value for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I understand your perspective. I appreciate your understanding of the market value. However, I cannot afford 800 euros per month. How about we find a middle ground at 775 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 775 euros per month is closer to what I'm looking for, but it's still a bit lower than what I believe the apartment is worth. Can we meet in the middle at 787.50 euros per month, which is a fair compromise between your offer and mine?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I agree to the price of 787.50 euros per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 787.50 euros per month! This is a fair price for both parties, considering the quality and location of the apartment. Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Yi-Nuo. I look forward to having you as a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
